channel.title: nlin.SI updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: nlin.SI updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Reality conditions for sine-Gordon equation and quasi-periodic solutions in finite phase spaces
item.description: arXiv:2501.07862v2 Announce Type: new Abstract: Quasi-periodic solutions of the sine-Gordon equation are expressed in terms of $\wp_{1,2g-1}$-function, and reality conditions are completely determined. This new result leads to numerical computation and graphical representation of non-linear wave solutions. A way of obtaining finite-gap solutions by means of algebro-geometric integration is also explained, and a construction of the sine-Gordon hierarchy on coadjoint orbits of $\mathrm{SU}(2)$ loop group is addressed.
item.dc:creator: Julia Bernatska

item.title: Backlund transformation of Kaup Kupershmidt equations with mutli soliton solutions un Darboux framewor
item.description: arXiv:2407.15205v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: This article encloses the derivation of Darboux solutions for Kaup Kupershmidt equations with their generalization in determinantal form. One of the main focuses of this work is to construct the Backlund transformation for the different solutions of that equation through its associated Riccati equation and then that transformations further reduces to its algebraic analogue with the help of One-fold Darboux solution. Finally, its exact solutions upto three solitons are calculated with their graphical representations which reveal dynamical profiles of these solutions.
item.dc:creator: Irfan Mahmood
